PackageOracle.name: DA_STREET_ADDRESS_DETAIL
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_STREET_ADDRESS_DETAIL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.20.551373000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_all_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_predirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_num IN VARCHAR2
,street_postdirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_nm IN VARCHAR2
,street_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,building_num IN VARCHAR2
,unit_num IN VARCHAR2
,floor_num IN VARCHAR2
,workspace_num IN VARCHAR2
,route_num IN VARCHAR2
,latitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,longitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_all_txt IN VARCHAR2

,house_num IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_predirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_num IN VARCHAR2
,street_postdirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_nm IN VARCHAR2
,street_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,building_num IN VARCHAR2
,unit_num IN VARCHAR2
,floor_num IN VARCHAR2
,workspace_num IN VARCHAR2
,route_num IN VARCHAR2
,latitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,longitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,street_address_id IN NUMBER
,address_all_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_predirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_num IN VARCHAR2
,street_postdirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_nm IN VARCHAR2
,street_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,building_num IN VARCHAR2
,unit_num IN VARCHAR2
,floor_num IN VARCHAR2
,workspace_num IN VARCHAR2
,route_num IN VARCHAR2
,latitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,longitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,street_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_street_address_detail;

body.name: DA_STREET_ADDRESS_DETAIL
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_STREET_ADDRESS_DETAIL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.20.565153000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_all_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_predirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_num IN VARCHAR2
,street_postdirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_nm IN VARCHAR2
,street_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,building_num IN VARCHAR2
,unit_num IN VARCHAR2
,floor_num IN VARCHAR2
,workspace_num IN VARCHAR2
,route_num IN VARCHAR2
,latitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,longitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_street_address_detail.add(fx), parms=' || address_all_txt || '|' || house_num_prefix_txt || '|' || house_num || '|' || house_num_suffix_txt || '|' || street_predirection_txt || '|' || street_num || '|' || street_postdirection_txt || '|' || street_nm || '|' || street_suffix_txt || '|' || building_num || '|' || unit_num || '|' || floor_num || '|' || workspace_num || '|' || route_num || '|' || latitude_num || '|' || longitude_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_street_address_detail a
(
a.street_address_id
,a.address_all_txt
,a.house_num_prefix_txt
,a.house_num
,a.house_num_suffix_txt
,a.street_predirection_txt
,a.street_num
,a.street_postdirection_txt
,a.street_nm
,a.street_suffix_txt
,a.building_num
,a.unit_num
,a.floor_num
,a.workspace_num
,a.route_num
,a.latitude_num
,a.longitude_num
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_street_address_id.NEXTVAL
,add.address_all_txt
,add.house_num_prefix_txt
,add.house_num
,add.house_num_suffix_txt
,add.street_predirection_txt
,add.street_num
,add.street_postdirection_txt
,add.street_nm
,add.street_suffix_txt
,add.building_num
,add.unit_num
,add.floor_num
,add.workspace_num
,add.route_num
,add.latitude_num
,add.longitude_num
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.street_address_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_street_address_detail.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_all_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_predirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_num IN VARCHAR2
,street_postdirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_nm IN VARCHAR2
,street_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,building_num IN VARCHAR2
,unit_num IN VARCHAR2
,floor_num IN VARCHAR2
,workspace_num IN VARCHAR2
,route_num IN VARCHAR2
,latitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,longitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_street_address_detail.add, parms=' || address_all_txt || '|' || house_num_prefix_txt || '|' || house_num || '|' || house_num_suffix_txt || '|' || street_predirection_txt || '|' || street_num || '|' || street_postdirection_txt || '|' || street_nm || '|' || street_suffix_txt || '|' || building_num || '|' || unit_num || '|' || floor_num || '|' || workspace_num || '|' || route_num || '|' || latitude_num || '|' || longitude_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_street_address_detail a
(
a.street_address_id
,a.address_all_txt
,a.house_num_prefix_txt
,a.house_num
,a.house_num_suffix_txt
,a.street_predirection_txt
,a.street_num
,a.street_postdirection_txt
,a.street_nm
,a.street_suffix_txt
,a.building_num
,a.unit_num
,a.floor_num
,a.workspace_num
,a.route_num
,a.latitude_num
,a.longitude_num
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_street_address_id.NEXTVAL
,add.address_all_txt
,add.house_num_prefix_txt
,add.house_num
,add.house_num_suffix_txt
,add.street_predirection_txt
,add.street_num
,add.street_postdirection_txt
,add.street_nm
,add.street_suffix_txt
,add.building_num
,add.unit_num
,add.floor_num
,add.workspace_num
,add.route_num
,add.latitude_num
,add.longitude_num
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_street_address_detail.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,street_address_id IN NUMBER
,address_all_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,house_num IN VARCHAR2
,house_num_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_predirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_num IN VARCHAR2
,street_postdirection_txt IN VARCHAR2
,street_nm IN VARCHAR2
,street_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,building_num IN VARCHAR2
,unit_num IN VARCHAR2
,floor_num IN VARCHAR2
,workspace_num IN VARCHAR2
,route_num IN VARCHAR2
,latitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,longitude_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_street_address_detail.add, parms=' || street_address_id || '|' || address_all_txt || '|' || house_num_prefix_txt || '|' || house_num || '|' || house_num_suffix_txt || '|' || street_predirection_txt || '|' || street_num || '|' || street_postdirection_txt || '|' || street_nm || '|' || street_suffix_txt || '|' || building_num || '|' || unit_num || '|' || floor_num || '|' || workspace_num || '|' || route_num || '|' || latitude_num || '|' || longitude_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_street_address_detail a
(
a.street_address_id
,a.address_all_txt
,a.house_num_prefix_txt
,a.house_num
,a.house_num_suffix_txt
,a.street_predirection_txt
,a.street_num
,a.street_postdirection_txt
,a.street_nm
,a.street_suffix_txt
,a.building_num
,a.unit_num
,a.floor_num
,a.workspace_num
,a.route_num
,a.latitude_num
,a.longitude_num
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.street_address_id
,add.address_all_txt
,add.house_num_prefix_txt
,add.house_num
,add.house_num_suffix_txt
,add.street_predirection_txt
,add.street_num
,add.street_postdirection_txt
,add.street_nm
,add.street_suffix_txt
,add.building_num
,add.unit_num
,add.floor_num
,add.workspace_num
,add.route_num
,add.latitude_num
,add.longitude_num
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_street_address_detail.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,street_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_street_address_detail.del, parms=' || street_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_street_address_detail a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.street_address_id = del.street_address_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_street_address_detail.del');

END del;

END da_street_address_detail;
